segments.text: I see the boy is really stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's on is wobbling, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm afraid he might tip over and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be helping him, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often when the woman is not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the children's actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how focused she is on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and the puddle is getting bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to slip and fall if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they realize what's happening before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm getting really anxious watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
